title: Cathay Pacific – World’s Best Economy Class Sale
content: Cathay Pacific celebrates its Skytrax award with discounted Economy Class fares. The promotion, running from 7–31 Jul 2025, offers CA$50 off flights from Vancouver to Hong Kong and CA$100 off flights from Vancouver or Toronto to Southeast Asia and Japan. Travel: 15 Sep 2025–31 Mar 2026. Promo codes: BEST2HKGCA, BESTECOCA.

title: HK Express – HKSAR Anniversary Sale
content: HK Express offers one-way fares from HK$28. Routes: Guiyang, Beijing, Ningbo, etc. Booking: until 1 Jul; Travel: 14 Jul–14 Dec 2025.
